trans-unit.source: Since some dictionary objects can be contained within other objects, you can qualify those dictionary object names. Each component is separated from the next by a period. An SQL92Identifier is "dot-separated." You qualify a dictionary object name in order to avoid ambiguity.

seg-source.mrk: Since some dictionary objects can be contained within other objects, you can qualify those dictionary object names.
Each component is separated from the next by a period.
An SQL92Identifier is "dot-separated." You qualify a dictionary object name in order to avoid ambiguity.
